passage.title: A busy family
passage.paragraph: Xiao Li is a good driver. He is twenty-five years old. He drives a car in a factory. He works from Monday to Friday. His home is far away from the factory. He gets up at six o'clock, and goes to work at half past six. At eight he must get there. He has no time to have breadfast at home. He leaves the factory at five o'clock in the afternoon. He cooks supper and does housework in the evening. He likes reading very much. Sometimes he watches TV. He goes to bed at about ten.
